main event: Several fragments of light were observed in the sky over Brazil on February 27, 1962. A more detailed report was requested but not received.
interesting points: The sighting was reported over the radio as a 'UFO'.
The Air Force considers this to be a meteor/fireball and/or probable explanation.
Investigation results indicate this is most likely a case of a meteor and/or probable aircraft sighted by several witnesses in the area.
The commanding officer of the ship Hesperides and other crew members confirmed the sighting of an unidentified bright, luminous sphere-shaped object that passed directly over the ship.
The object was described as 10-15 meters in diameter, following a horizontal straight course at an estimated speed of 800-1000 knots.
sighted object: several fragments of light, bright and luminous sphere-shaped object
